#summary Returns a HTML select tag with minutes as options.
#labels method,helper,date

This method returns minutes from 0 to 59. If you don't want every minute between 0 and 59 included in the drop-down you can limit it by passing in the minute_step argument. If you for example pass in minute_step=15 you will get 00,15,30 and 45 as options.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| minute_step || no || numeric || 1 || use to limit the amount of minutes to display ||

*Examples:*

{{{
#minuteSelectTag()#
}}}

{{{
#minuteSelectTag(minute_step=10)#
}}}
